cause.description:
Our Grandma was diagnosed with ALS and passed away 12 years ago. She was an incredible woman with a loving heart. ALS is a neuromuscular disease, basically overtime the muscles degenerate from your toes to your neck, it's a painful and terrible disease. We are trying to raise $500.00 by September for the Walk to D'Feet ALS! All proceeds will go in honor of our grandma and directly to the ALS Association-Rocky Mountain Chapter! Thank you for your kindness and Generosity.
1. Raise Money for those who really truly need it
2. Raising Money will benefit the ALS Society and Patients with ALS
3. We can hopefully find a cure for this terrible disease.
cause.mission: Raise Money For the ALS Association
cause.name: ALS Association
